fpmExplorer:Page.title: Filter Bar
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The filter bar enables users to set criteria that limit the data loaded and displayed in a table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Define Filter Fields
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Use the following annotation to define the filters shown in the filter bar. The Search and Editing Status are out-of-the-box filters that appear if the entities are searchable and draft is enabled, respectively.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Connect Filter Bar to Table
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Connect the Filter Bar to a Table using the 'filterBar' property of the Table building block. Provide the ID of the Filter Bar, which can be either a local or global ID.
